titleStmt.title: An apologie, or defence of our dayes, against the vaine murmurings & complaints of manie wherein is plainly proued, that our dayes are more happie & blessed than the dayes of our forefathers.
titleStmt.author: Trigge, Francis, 1547?-1606.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A defence of these our dayes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
